title: The Crystal Comeback
body:
Crystals are more popular than ever. They are being incorporated into everything from modern technology and skincare to healing and spiritual practices.

In this series premiere, we dive into the comeback crystals are making today, as well as the history and science behind their power and potential. Explore the Scientific, Vedic, Daoist, Hermetic, Native American, and New Age perspectives to unearth the multifaceted mysteries of the ancient mineral kingdom.
teaser:
Crystals are more popular than ever and being incorporated into everything from modern technology and skincare to healing and spiritual practices.
In this series premiere, dive into the crystal comeback of today to learn their power and potential.
cast: Gregg Braden, Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Luke Blue Eagle, Antoinette Aurell, Tiffany April Raines, Leslie Franks

title: How Does Crystal Healing Work?
body:
How do crystals, these seemingly inanimate objects, amplify the healing process? 

In this episode, experts share the science behind how crystals can heal the body, mind, and spirit. Discover how the frequencies of crystals interact with our bodies to rebalance our energy fields. 

From activating chakras, energy centers, and the nervous system to the effects on our body’s physical vibration and electromagnetic field, experts offer their unique perspectives and experiences on how crystals can be one of our greatest healers.
teaser:
How do crystals, seemingly inanimate objects, amplify healing?
From activating chakras and the nervous system to the effects on our body’s vibration and electromagnetic field, experts offer unique perspectives on how crystals can be our greatest healers.
cast: Gregg Braden, Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Luke Blue Eagle, Antoinette Aurell, Tiffany April Raines, Leslie Franks

title: Your Crystal Healing Toolkit
body:
Our planet has an abundant variety of crystals, each with unique properties and abilities. So how do you know which crystal to work with? In this episode, our experts delve into the uses, functions, systems, and colors of crystals that promote physical and mental wellbeing.

* Create your own crystal healing toolkit by exploring which crystal to use for the following purposes:
* Balancing masculine and feminine energies
* Working with the seven rays of light in the yogic chakra system
* Activating and clearing the three Daoist elixir fields
* Tapping into the planetary archetypes of Vedic astrology
* Easing chronic or acute discomfort through the etheric body
teaser: Our planet has an abundant variety of crystals, each with unique properties and abilities. In this episode, our experts delve into the uses, functions, systems, and colors of crystals that promote physical and mental wellbeing.
cast: Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Luke Blue Eagle, Antoinette Aurell, Tiffany April Raines, Leslie Franks

title: Geometries of Crystal Healing
body:
Does the structure of a crystal inform its use? Is there a best shape for processing grief, attracting a partner, or creating abundance? 

When we look out into the cosmos, we find the same geometric patterns splayed across the universe that we see within crystals on Earth. How do these lattice structures and the origins of crystals impact the healing of the physical and emotional bodies?

In this episode, our experts explore the inner workings of crystals and how their geometries are used for different types of healing. This gives us insight to: 
 
* How the origin story of a crystal’s formation is transmitted into our bodies
* Difference between lab-made and naturally-formed crystals	
* Vogel crystals as quantum converters correlate with the tree of life to amplify healing resonance
teaser: Does the structure of a crystal inform its use? Is there a best shape for processing grief, attracting a partner, or creating abundance? Our experts explore the inner workings of crystals and how their geometries are used for different types of healing.
cast: Gregg Braden, Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Luke Blue Eagle, Antoinette Aurell, Tiffany April Raines, Leslie Franks

title: Creating & Charging Crystal Grids
body:
One of the most powerful ways of working with crystals is by creating grids. These intentional geometric constructions enhance the healing power and consciousness of any space they occupy. To create a grid, you need to learn how to purify and energize your crystals to get the most out of them. Our team of experts explain and demonstrate how to: 

* Create simple and powerful crystal grids
* Construct a Native American Medicine Wheel with crystals
* Purify and charge your crystals
* Use caution when energizing certain types of crystals
* Care and storage of your crystals
teaser: One of the most powerful ways of working with crystals is by creating grids. Our team of experts explain and demonstrate how to purify and energize them.
cast: Gregg Braden, Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Luke Blue Eagle, Antoinette Aurell, Tiffany April Raines, Leslie Franks

title: Awakening & Activating Your Crystals
body:
Do you know how to speak with your crystals and how to listen? Do you know how best to ask for the help you seek? From choosing the right crystal to purifying and programming, our team of experts reveal how you can cultivate a lasting relationship with your crystals and stones. Their advice includes how to:
 
* Awaken your crystal when you receive it
* Communicate & meditate with your crystal to understand how it can help you
* Create your personal crystal talisman
* Program the crystal to get the best results from it
* Perform a simple consecration ceremony to purify your crystal
teaser: Do you know how to speak with your crystals and how to listen? From choosing the right crystal to purifying and programming, our team of experts reveal how you can cultivate a lasting relationship with your crystals and stones.
cast: Gregg Braden, Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Luke Blue Eagle, Antoinette Aurell, Tiffany April Raines, Leslie Franks

title: Alchemy, Gem Elixirs & Vibrational Healing
body:
Creating gem elixirs through the process of crystal alchemy is one of the most potent ways of working with stones.
 
Classical alchemy has long sought to transmute base materials into higher states through careful processes and preparations. Alchemical healing with crystals does the same by infusing water with the healing essence of special stones. (For more insight, we recommend watching Secret of Water: https://www.gaia.com/video/secret-water.) This brings the crystals’ vibrational healing into your body, transforming your world from the inside out. Our experts explain what you need to know to safely create gem elixirs then demonstrate how different traditions prepare them.
 
* In this episode you will learn:
* How water transfers the vibrational essence of the crystals into our bodies
* How to choose safe stones for creating elixirs and how to avoid unsafe ones
* The meanings of stone colors and their healing properties
* The stages of alchemy and how they apply to crystal healing
* The alchemical formula that will support the highest vibration of yourself and transform your consciousness
teaser: Alchemical healing with crystals is infusing water with the healing essence of special stones, bringing the crystals’ vibrational healing into your body, transforming your world from the inside out.
cast: Luke Blue Eagle, Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Leslie Franks

title: Crystal Myths, Mysticism & Divination
body:
Where do we get our understanding of how to use crystals?

Throughout history there has been a mystical obsession with crystals ranging from the power sources of Atlantis to the alchemists’ philosopher’s stone. As sages and mystics learned to connect with the mineral kingdom, they began to unlock the mysteries of crystals and passed those secrets through the ages. Our team of experts have spent years studying the myths and mysticism of crystals and now share the ancient tales which reveal how you can:

* Learn to communicate with the mineral kingdom
* Strengthen your connection between the physical and spiritual worlds
* Access the gifts of crystals that support healing
* Raise your consciousness to higher levels
* Improve your psychic and divination abilities
teaser: Where do we get our understanding of how to use crystals? As sages and mystics learned to connect with the mineral kingdom, they began to unlock the mysteries of crystals and passed those secrets through the ages.
cast: Theresa Bullard-Whyke, Luke Blue Eagle, Leslie Franks, Antoinette Aurell
